name: Buddy Brawl
description:
Buddy Brawl is a physics based fighting game where four players fight against each other and compete to be the last one standing on the map.  Players fight across several maps that each have hazardous elements.

Features
  • Local 4-player free-for-all
  • 4 playable characters
  • Various player actions (jumping, quick attacks, launch attacks, blocking, and parrying)
  • 3 lives per character
  • 3 maps of varying hazard amounts
Partial Controller Support

This game is compatible with the following controllers: 

  • Xbox One 
  • Xbox 360 controllers
Credits

Made for MICA Advanced 2D Game Design course by Zack Combs, Liam Wiley, Ariana Candido, and Samuel Hudgins
